subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kell was a 10-time All-Star and Hall of Fame third baseman who won the American League batting championship in 1949 with the Detroit Tigers and later became a longtime broadcaster for the team.
snippet: Mr. Kell was a 10-time All-Star and Hall of Fame third baseman who won the American League batting championship in 1949 with the Detroit Tigers and later became a longtime broadcaster for the team.
